c:facetType.name: AxisLabelOverlappingOptionsFacet
c:facetType.c:documentation: The options documentation class of the axes label overlapping facet.

c:property.name: overlappedLabelsMode
c:property.c:documentation: Controls how labels are laid out when they overlap.

c:property.name: labelSpacingMin
c:property.c:documentation: The minimum spacing between tick labels, in em units.
